scripts.prisma-generate: dotenv -e .env.production.local -- pnpm exec prisma generate && dotenv -e .env.production.local -- pnpm exec prisma generate --schema prisma_pgvector/schema_ai.prisma
scripts.prisma-generate-dev: dotenv -e .env.development.local -- pnpm exec prisma generate && dotenv -e .env.development.local -- pnpm exec prisma generate --schema prisma_pgvector/schema_ai.prisma
scripts.prisma-db-push: dotenv -e .env.development.local -- pnpm exec prisma db push
scripts.prisma-migrate-prod: dotenv -e .env.production.local -- pnpm exec prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma-migrate-dev: dotenv -e .env.development.local -- pnpm exec prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma-migrate-reset: dotenv -e .env.development.local -- pnpm exec prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.prisma-migrate-ci: pnpm exec prisma migrate reset --force && pnpm exec prisma generate
scripts.start-prod: dotenv -e .env.production.local -- pnpm run build && dotenv -e .env.production.local -- node dist/index.js
scripts.start-dev: dotenv -e .env.development.local -- pnpm run build && dotenv -e .env.development.local -- nodemon
